item.title: Gattu's Pride: Swarna Mallika Selected as Junior Civil Judge in Statewide Recruitment
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gattu Mandal – A proud moment for the region, as Swarna Mallika from Gattu mandal headquarters has been selected as a Junior Civil Judge in the recently announced results. Among the 44 candidates chosen across the state, Swarna Mallika stood out as one of the successful candidates, bringing pride to her family and community.
Swarna Mallika’s academic journey has been marked by consistent excellence. She completed her schooling (Grades 1 to 10) at Sri Sathya Sai Vidya Nilayam in Gadwal. ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
